description: Strategic guidance and governance framework development for effective management of AWS cloud resources.
justification: This product can help establish governance priorities, evaluate compliance requirements, develop risk management frameworks, and address multiple quick win items related to governance, compliance and security.

description: Ongoing management and optimization of your AWS cloud environment to ensure performance, security, and cost-efficiency.
justification: This product provides ongoing optimization, security management, cost governance and other capabilities that can address multiple quick win items related to security, cost and performance.
